author: Andrew Beaton
title: The Big Questions That Will Shape the NFL Draft
text:
There’s a simple reason the draft captures a special place in the NFL psyche: It captures every deranged football fantasy. In one pick, fans of the worst teams in football can see the player who will lead them out of the squalor—or the one who will be the face of the team’s continued ignominy.
This year’s draft straddles that temperamental crisis more than most. Why? It’s the Year of the Quarterback. And no players drive fans as absolutely mad as quarterbacks. It’s the most important position in the sport. Which means they’re...
